summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal water system of The City of Seattle; adopting a system or plan of additions or betterments to or extensions of the existing municipal water system; authorizing the issuance and sale of water system revenue bonds for the purposes of paying part of the cost of carrying out that system or plan, refunding a portion of the City's outstanding water system revenue bonds, providing a bond reserve and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds authorized herein; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds; describing the lien of those bonds; and creating certain accounts of the City relating to those bonds.
